description: create a trigger on order details
body:
CREATE TRIGGER OrderDetails_TRUI ON dbo.[Order Details] FOR INSERT, UPDATE
AS
BEGIN
    UPDATE dbo.[Order Details]
	 SET LineTotal = (i.UnitPrice * i.Quantity) - (i.UnitPrice * i.Quantity * i.Discount)
	 FROM inserted i
	 WHERE i.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID
	 AND i.ProductID = [Order Details].ProductID
END
